page.title: 20THE CREDITS
page.content: This block was surveyed by the pupils of the top class in Rhosgoch Primary School. Their teacher was Mrs Margaret Morris. Valuable help was given by other members of staff while Mary Price and Sheila Meredith volunteered local expertise. A local student Sharon Meredith helped the childern plan the questionaires and a pupil from Gwernyfed High school, K Rigotti, entered the data onto the disc. The members of the class are Georgina Turner, Hayley Nicholls, Wendy Jones, Gareth Price, Paul Williams, Bethan Lloyd, Philip Harley, Mark Lloyd and George Herdman. They were helped by Elizabeth Mills, Rebecca & Jonathan Miles, Martin Price, Emma Gore, Zachary & Stuart Jones and Martin Price. The 2nd years were Zoe Abberly, Maria Lloyd and Sarah Mills.
